020
021import com.google.common.io.ByteArrayDataOutput;
022import com.google.common.io.ByteStreams;
023import net.tnemc.core.TNECore;
024import net.tnemc.core.currency.Currency;
025import net.tnemc.core.io.serialization.impl.SerialCurrency;
026import net.tnemc.plugincore.PluginCore;
027import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.channel.ChannelBytesWrapper;
028import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.channel.ChannelMessageHandler;
029import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.compatibility.log.DebugLevel;
030
031import java.util.ArrayList;
032import java.util.Iterator;
033import java.util.List;
034import java.util.UUID;
035
036/**
037 * ConfigHandler
038 *
039 * @author creatorfromhell
040 * @since 0.1.2.0
041 */
042public class ConfigHandler extends ChannelMessageHandler {
043
044  public ConfigHandler() {
045
046    super("config");
047  }
048
049  public static void send() {
050
051    if(!TNECore.instance().data().getYaml().getString("Data.Sync.Config.Hub", "none").equalsIgnoreCase("none")) {
052      return;
053    }
054
055    //hub string
056    //currency size short
057    //currencies string
058    //configs
059
060    final ByteArrayDataOutput out = ByteStreams.newDataOutput();
061    out.writeUTF(TNECore.instance().data().getYaml().getString("Data.Sync.Config.SharingPin", "000000"));
062
063    //write our currencies to the stream
064    out.writeShort(TNECore.eco().currency().currencies().size());
065    for(final Currency currency : TNECore.eco().currency().currencies()) {
066      out.writeUTF(new SerialCurrency().toJSON(currency).toJSONString());
067    }
068    out.writeUTF("config.yml:" + TNECore.instance().config().getYaml().dump());
069    out.writeUTF("messages.yml:" + TNECore.instance().message().getYaml().dump());
070
071    TNECore.instance().storage().sendProxyMessage("tne:config", out.toByteArray());
072  }
073
074  @Override
075  public void handle(final ChannelBytesWrapper wrapper) {
076
077    if(TNECore.instance().data().getYaml().getString("Data.Sync.Config.Hub", "none").equalsIgnoreCase("none") ||
078       !TNECore.instance().data().getYaml().getBoolean("Data.Sync.Config.Sync", true)) {
079      return;
080    }
081
082    try {
083
084      //make sure this is the hub server we want to sync with.
085      final String hub = wrapper.readUTF();
086      if(!hub.equalsIgnoreCase(TNECore.instance().data().getYaml().getString("Data.Sync.Config.Hub", "none"))) {
087        return;
088      }
089
090      final List<String> sync = new ArrayList<>();
091      sync.addAll(TNECore.instance().data().getYaml().getStringList("Data.Sync.Config.Configs"));
092
093      //sync our currencies
094      final short currencies = wrapper.readShort();
095      TNECore.eco().currency().currencies().clear();
096      final List<UUID> loaded = new ArrayList<>();
097      for(int i = 0; i < currencies; i++) {
098
099        final String json = wrapper.readUTF();
100
101        if(sync.contains("currency")) {
102          final Currency currency = new SerialCurrency().fromJSON(json);
103          TNECore.eco().currency().addCurrency(currency);
104          loaded.add(currency.getUid());
105        }
106      }
107
108      //Delete currencies that weren't a part of the sync.
109      final Iterator<Currency> it = TNECore.eco().currency().currencies().iterator();
110      while(it.hasNext()) {
111        final Currency cur = it.next();
112
113        if(!loaded.contains(cur.getUid())) {
114          it.remove();
115          TNECore.eco().currency().delete(cur.getUid());
116        }
117      }
118
119      //Load configurations from stream
120      for(int i = 0; i < 2; i++) {
121        final String config = wrapper.readUTF();
122        final String[] parts = config.split(":");
123
124        if(parts.length < 2) {
125          continue;
126        }
127
128        if(parts[0].equals("messages.yml")) {
129          if(sync.contains("messages.yml")) {
130            //TODO: This needs a new work around or removed since plugin channels are limited.
131            //TNECore.instance().message().setYaml(YamlFile.loadConfigurationFromString(parts[1], true));
132          }
133        } else {
134          if(sync.contains("config.yml")) {
135            //TODO: This needs a new work around or removed since plugin channels are limited.
136            //TNECore.instance().config().setYaml(YamlFile.loadConfigurationFromString(parts[1], true));
137          }
138        }
139
140        //End loop if we reached messages.yml because it is the last config we have.
141        if(parts[0].equalsIgnoreCase("messages.yml")) {
142          break;
143        }
144      }
145
146    } catch(Exception e) {
147      PluginCore.log().error("Issue while retrieving config sync data!", e, DebugLevel.OFF);
148    }
149  }
150}
